title: Aim Hero
notes: Cursor moves down when moving it horizontally. Some select boxes' items are all invisible

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.25.0, 4.17.0-8.1-liquorix-amd64, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes:
Invisible menus.
The real indefensible part is the mouse drift. Working past the menus isn't too bad, but a game that has mouse drift(moving down and to the right has "resistance" in this case) that is about aiming is fundamentally broken.
